analyzed: tshor ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //

One should see the non-production of the perfection of wisdom as the non-production of consciousness.

original: lce skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lce skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The non-production of the perfection of wisdom should be seen because of the non-production of the tongue.

original: lus skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lus skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The non-production of the perfection of wisdom should be seen because of the non-production of the body.

original: gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The non-production of the perfection of wisdom should be seen because of the non-production of forms.

analyzed: sgra skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //

analyzed: reg skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: For the non-arising of touch, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising.

original: chos skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: chos skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: For the non-arising of dharmas, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising.

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because the tongue consciousness is non-arisen.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because the body consciousness is non-arisen.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o; ;yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba mağŸ”½mchis par blta'o //

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-production because of the non-production of eye contact.

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //

analyzed: @389b sna'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-production because of the non-production of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-production because of the non-production of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-production because of the non-production of body contact.

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba mi mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of feeling that arises from the condition of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½sa'i khams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi @390a *//
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o // sa'i khams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi @390a *//
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of feelings that arise due to the condition of mental contact.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of the water element.

original: me'i khams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½rlung gi khams skye bo ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //

translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of the fire element.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of ignorance.

original: 'du byed skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: 'du byed skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of name and form.

original: skye mched drug skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the six sense spheres.

original: reg pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis @390b par blta'o //
analyzed: reg pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis @390b par blta'o //
translated: Because contact is non-arising, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising.

original: tshor ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: tshor ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because feeling is non-arising, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising.

original: sred pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½len pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½srid pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: sred pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o // len pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o // srid pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because craving is non-arising, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising.ğŸ”½Because grasping is non-arising, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising.ğŸ”½Because becoming is non-arising, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising.

original: skye ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: skye ba skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because birth is non-arising, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising.

original: rga shi skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rga shi skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because of the non-production of old age and death, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-produced.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because of the non-production of the perfection of giving, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-produced.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because of the non-production of the perfection of morality, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-produced.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because of the non-production of the perfection of patience, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-produced.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis ba'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis ba'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because of the non-production of the perfection of effort, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-produced.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu @391a *//ğŸ”½phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu @391a *// phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the emptiness of the great.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye pa ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye pa ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of emptiness that is not a beginning or end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of emptiness that is not discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid skye ba @391b ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid skye ba @391b ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the emptiness of non-things.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the emptiness of essence.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the emptiness of the essence of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because the correct exertions are non-arisen.

original: dbang po rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because the bases of supernatural powers are non-arisen.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because the faculties are non-arisen.

original: stobs @392a *// rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: stobs @392a *// rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because the powers are non-arisen.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because the branches of enlightenment are non-arisen.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The noble eightfold path should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.ğŸ”½The noble truths should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.ğŸ”½The concentrations should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The immeasurables should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.ğŸ”½The formless absorptions should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.ğŸ”½The emptinesses should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.ğŸ”½The doors of liberation should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.

original: bsam gtan rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.ğŸ”½The correct exertions should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.ğŸ”½The supports for miraculous ability should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.ğŸ”½The faculties should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.ğŸ”½The powers should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.

original: tshad med pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The branches of enlightenment should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.ğŸ”½The path should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.ğŸ”½The ten powers should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.ğŸ”½The four fearlessnesses should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.ğŸ”½The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of form.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes @392b rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes @392b rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gates of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of the dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The powers of the tathÄgatas should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of the powers of the tathÄgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The fearlessnesses should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: snying rje chen po skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Great compassion should be seen as non-arising because of the non-arising of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The eighteen dharmas of the Buddha are not produced, and therefore the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not produced.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The result of stream-enterer is not produced, and therefore the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not produced.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba @393a *//ğŸ”½ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba @393a *// ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The result of once-returner is not produced, and therefore the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not produced.ğŸ”½The result of non-returner is not produced, and therefore the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not produced.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Arhatship is not produced, and therefore the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not produced.

original: rang byang chub skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of pratyekabuddhahood;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of the knowledge of path aspects;

original: byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-arisen because of the non-arising of awakening, Buddha, and buddhadharmas;

original: sems can rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: sems can rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom should be seen as essenceless because of the essencelessness of sentient beings;

original: gzugs rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: gzugs rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom should be seen as essenceless because of the essencelessness of form;

original: tshor ba rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: tshor ba rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Feeling is not existent, and therefore the perfection of wisdom is not existent.

original: 'du shes rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½'du byed rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: 'du shes rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o // 'du byed rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Perception is not existent, and therefore the perfection of wisdom is not existent.ğŸ”½Disposition is not existent, and therefore the perfection of wisdom is not existent.

original: rnam par shes pa rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @393b rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½mig rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @393b rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o // mig rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Consciousness is not existent, and therefore the perfection of wisdom is not existent.ğŸ”½The eyes are not existent, and therefore the perfection of wisdom is not existent.

original: rna ba rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rna ba rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The ears are not existent, and therefore the perfection of wisdom is not existent.

original: sna rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: sna rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the nose is without an intrinsic nature, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as without an intrinsic nature.

original: lce rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lce rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the tongue is without an intrinsic nature, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as without an intrinsic nature.

original: lus rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lus rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the body is without an intrinsic nature, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as without an intrinsic nature.

original: yid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: yid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the mind is without an intrinsic nature, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as without an intrinsic nature.

original: gzugs rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //

translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as having no intrinsic nature because the emptiness of the unconditioned has no intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as having no intrinsic nature because the emptiness of what is beyond extremes has no intrinsic nature.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma @396b mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //

translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as having no intrinsic nature because the emptiness of what is neither with nor without is no intrinsic nature.

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as having no intrinsic nature because the emptiness of nature has no intrinsic nature.

analyzed: stobs rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as having no intrinsic nature because the powers have no intrinsic nature.

translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as having no intrinsic nature because the branches of awakening have no intrinsic nature.

translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as having no intrinsic nature because the noble eightfold path has no intrinsic nature.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //

translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as having no intrinsic nature because the formless absorptions have no intrinsic nature.

translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as having no intrinsic nature because the emptiness, signless, and wishless gateways to liberation have no intrinsic nature.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //

analyzed: snying rje chen po rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o //

translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as having no nature because awakening, buddha, and buddhadharmas have no nature.

analyzed: sems can dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as having no substance because sentient beings have no substance.

analyzed: gzugs dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as having no substance because form has no substance.

analyzed: tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because feeling is not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

analyzed: rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because consciousness is not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

analyzed: mig dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the eyes are not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

analyzed: rna ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the ears are not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

analyzed: sna dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //

analyzed: mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //

analyzed: yid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the thinking mind is non-apprehensible, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible.

analyzed: gzugs dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because a form is non-apprehensible, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible.

analyzed: sgra dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because a sound is non-apprehensible, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible.

translated: Because smell is non-apprehensible, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible.ğŸ”½Because taste is non-apprehensible, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible.

original: reg dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: reg dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because touch is non-apprehensible, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible.

original: chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because dharmas are non-apprehensible, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because eye consciousness is non-apprehensible, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because ear consciousness is non-apprehensible, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as a non-entity because the nose consciousness is a non-entity.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis @399b pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis @399b pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as a non-entity because the tongue consciousness is a non-entity.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as a non-entity because the body consciousness is a non-entity.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as a non-entity because the mind consciousness is a non-entity.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as a non-entity because the eye contact is a non-entity.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //

translated: Because the composite of contact through the coming together of ear is not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.ğŸ”½Because the composite of contact through the coming together of nose is not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the composite of contact through the coming together of tongue is not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the composite of contact through the coming together of body is not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the composite of contact through the coming together of thinking mind is not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as a non-entity because the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of eye is a non-entity.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha @400a *//ğŸ”½rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha @400a *// rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as a non-entity because the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of ear is a non-entity.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as a non-entity because the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of nose is a non-entity.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as a non-entity because the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of tongue is a non-entity.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as a non-entity because the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of body is a non-entity.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is the combination of the body and a tactile object does not exist, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not existing.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is the combination of the mind and mental phenomena does not exist, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not existing.

original: sa'i khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the earth element does not exist, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not existing.

original: chu'i khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the water element does not exist, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not existing.

original: me'i khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: me'i khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the fire element does not exist, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not existing.

original: rlung gi khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½nam mkha'i khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o // nam mkha'i khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible because the wind element is non-apprehensible.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible because the space element is non-apprehensible.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du @400b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du @400b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible because the consciousness element is non-apprehensible.

original: ma rig pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible because ignorance is non-apprehensible.

original: 'du byed dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: 'du byed dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible because formative predispositions are non-apprehensible.

original: rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible because consciousness is non-apprehensible.

original: ming dang gzugs dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: because name and form are not entities, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not an entity.

original: skye mched drug dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: because the six sense spheres are not entities, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not an entity.

original: reg pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: reg pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: because contact is not an entity, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not an entity.

original: tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: because feeling is not an entity, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not an entity.

original: sred pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: sred pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: because craving is not an entity, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not an entity.

original: len pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: len pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: because grasping is not an entity, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not an entity.ğŸ”½because becoming is not an entity, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not an entity.

original: srid pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: srid pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because existence is not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

original: skye ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: skye ba dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because birth is not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

original: rga shi dngos po ma mchis pa'i @401a *//
analyzed: rga shi dngos po ma mchis pa'i @401a *//
translated: Because old age and death are not things,

original: slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the perfection of generosity is not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the perfection of moral discipline is not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: Because the perfection of patience is not a thing, the perfection of wisdom should be seen as not a thing.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of perseverance should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a real basis.ğŸ”½The perfection of concentration should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a real basis.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½nang stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½phyi stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o // nang stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o // phyi stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a real basis.ğŸ”½The emptiness of internal phenomena should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a real basis.ğŸ”½The emptiness of external phenomena should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a real basis.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The emptiness of both external and internal phenomena should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a real basis.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of the great should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.

original: chen po stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i @401b slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //ğŸ”½don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i @401b slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o // don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of conditioned phenomena should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of the unlimited should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of non-dispersal should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of inherent existence should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of all things should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of non-apprehension should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of essential nature should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of non-things should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of other things should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness of all things should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics should be seen as non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature.ğŸ”½The emptiness

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible because the emptiness of what transcends limits is non-apprehensible.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //

translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible because the emptiness of no beginning and no end is non-apprehensible.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //

translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as non-apprehensible because the emptiness of non-rejection is non-apprehensible.

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o //

analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The emptiness of the causal condition of the eye, form, and visual consciousness should be seen as the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom.ğŸ”½The emptiness of the causal condition of the ear, sound, and auditory consciousness should be seen as the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom.ğŸ”½The emptiness of the causal condition of the nose, smell, and olfactory consciousness should be seen as the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The emptiness of the causal condition of the tongue, taste, and gustatory consciousness should be seen as the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The emptiness of the causal condition of the body, touch, and tactile consciousness should be seen as the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //

analyzed: sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //

analyzed: chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o // me'i khams stong @405a *//

analyzed: rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //

analyzed: nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //

analyzed: 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
