translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as emptiness because of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //ğŸ”½ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as emptiness because of the emptiness of things.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as emptiness because of the emptiness of own-marks.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as emptiness because of the emptiness of the non-existence of own-being.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as emptiness because of the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid @406b du blta'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid @406b du blta'o //
translated: The four right efforts are to be seen as emptiness because of emptiness.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //ğŸ”½dbang po rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o // dbang po rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The four legs of manifestation are to be seen as emptiness because of emptiness.ğŸ”½The five faculties are to be seen as emptiness because of emptiness.

original: stobs rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The five powers are to be seen as emptiness because of emptiness.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The seven factors of awakening are to be seen as emptiness because of emptiness.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The noble eightfold path is to be seen as emptiness because of emptiness.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The noble truths should be seen as empty because of emptiness.

original: bsam gtan rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //ğŸ”½tshad med pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o // tshad med pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The concentrations should be seen as empty because of emptiness.ğŸ”½The immeasurables should be seen as empty because of emptiness.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The formless absorptions should be seen as empty because of emptiness.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The deliverances should be seen as empty because of emptiness.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The successive stages of meditative absorption should be seen as empty because of emptiness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //ğŸ”½mngon par shes pa rnams @407a *//
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o // mngon par shes pa rnams @407a *//
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of wisdom should be seen because of the emptiness of the emptiness gate to liberation, the signless gate to liberation, and the wishless gate to liberation.

original: stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of wisdom should be seen because of the emptiness of the clairvoyances.ğŸ”½The emptiness of the perfection of wisdom should be seen because of the emptiness of the meditative stabilizations.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o; ;gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o; ;gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of wisdom should be seen because of the emptiness of the dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of wisdom should be seen because of the emptiness of the tathÄgata powers.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The four fearlessnesses should be seen as emptiness because of emptiness.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges should be seen as emptiness because of emptiness.

original: snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: Great compassion should be seen as emptiness because of emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //ğŸ”½rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha should be seen as emptiness because of emptiness.ğŸ”½The result of stream enterer should be seen as emptiness because of emptiness.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The result of once-returner should be seen as emptiness because of emptiness.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The fruit of non-returning should be seen as emptiness because of the emptiness of the fruit of non-returning.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The fruit of a worthy one should be seen as emptiness because of the emptiness of the fruit of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong @407b pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong @407b pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: Solitary realizersâ€™ enlightenment should be seen as emptiness because of the emptiness of solitary realizersâ€™ enlightenment.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: The knowledge of path aspects should be seen as emptiness because of the emptiness of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o //
translated: Awakening, buddhahood, and buddhadharmas should be seen as emptiness because of the emptiness of awakening, buddhahood, and buddhadharmas.

original: sems can dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: sems can dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: Sentient beings should be seen as isolated because of the isolation of sentient beings.

original: gzugs dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: gzugs dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because form is isolated.

original: tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because feeling is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because perception is isolated.

original: 'du shes dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o; ;'du byed dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: 'du shes dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o; ;'du byed dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because volitional factors are isolated.

original: rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because consciousness is isolated.

original: mig dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //ğŸ”½rna ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //ğŸ”½sna dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: mig dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o // rna ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o // sna dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the eyes are isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the ears are isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the nose is isolated.

original: lce dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: lce dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the tongue is isolated.

original: lus dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: lus dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because the body is isolated.

original: yid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: yid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because the mind is isolated.

original: gzugs dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: gzugs dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because form is isolated.

original: sgra dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha @408a *//ğŸ”½rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //ğŸ”½dri dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: sgra dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha @408a *// rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o // dri dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because sound is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because smell is isolated.

original: ro dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: ro dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because taste is isolated.

original: reg dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: reg dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because touch is isolated.

original: chos dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: chos dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because dharmas are isolated.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because eye consciousness is isolated.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //ğŸ”½sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the ear consciousness.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //ğŸ”½mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the thinking-mind consciousness.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the union of nose and smells.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i slad @408b du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i slad @408b du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the union of tongue and tastes.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the union of body and touchables.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the union of mind and dharmas.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of eye, form, and consciousness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of ear, sound, and consciousness.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o; ;lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o; ;lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the conditionings.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the eye and form.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the ear and sound, of the nose and smell, of the tongue and taste, of the body and touchable, of the mind and dharma.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the eye-consciousness, of the ear-consciousness, of the nose-consciousness, of the tongue-consciousness, of the body-consciousness, of the mind-consciousness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the eye-contact, of the ear-contact, of the nose-contact, of the tongue-contact, of the body-contact, of the mind-contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye-contact, of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear-contact, of the feeling that arises from the condition of nose-contact, of the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue-contact, of the feeling that arises from the condition of body-contact, of the feeling that arises from the condition of mind-contact.

original: sa'i khams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the water element.

original: me'i khams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: me'i khams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as being isolated because of the isolation of the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //ğŸ”½nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par @409a *//
analyzed: rlung gi khams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o // nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par @409a *//
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because of the isolation of the wind element.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because of the isolation of the space element.

original: blta'o; ;rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: blta'o; ;rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because of the isolation of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because of the isolation of ignorance.

original: 'du byed dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: 'du byed dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because of the isolation of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because of the isolation of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because of the isolation of name and form.

original: skye mched drug dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o; ;reg pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o; ;reg pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because contact is isolated.

original: tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because feeling is isolated.

original: sred pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: sred pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because craving is isolated.

original: len pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: len pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because grasping is isolated.

original: srid pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: srid pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because existence is isolated.

original: skye ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: skye ba dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because birth is isolated.

original: rga shi dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: rga shi dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because old age and death are isolated.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of giving is to be seen as isolated because of the isolation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is to be seen as isolated because of the isolation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol @409b tu phyin pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol @409b tu phyin pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is to be seen as isolated because of the isolation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of perseverance is to be seen as isolated because of the isolation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //ğŸ”½nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o // nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration is to be seen as isolated because of the isolation of the perfection of wisdom.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom is to be seen as isolated because of the isolation of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is to be seen as isolated because of the isolation of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because of the isolation of the emptiness of the external and the emptiness of the internal.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because of the isolation of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because of the isolation of the emptiness of the great.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because of the isolation of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //ğŸ”½'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because of the isolation of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because of the isolation of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be seen as isolated because of the isolation of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //ğŸ”½dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of no beginning and no end is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of non-rejection is isolated.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol @410a *//ğŸ”½tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol @410a *// tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of a basic nature is isolated.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of all things is isolated.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of specific characteristics is isolated.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of non-apprehension is isolated.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of non-apprehension is isolated.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of essential nature is isolated.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the applications of mindfulness are isolated.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o; ;yang dag par spong ba rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //ğŸ”½rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o; ;yang dag par spong ba rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the right efforts are isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the legs of miraculous power are isolated.

original: dbang po rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the faculties are isolated.

original: stobs rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o; ;byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o; ;byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the powers are isolated. The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the aspects of enlightenment are isolated.

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha @410b rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the noble eightfold path is isolated.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the noble truths are isolated.

original: bsam gtan rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //ğŸ”½tshad med pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o // tshad med pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the concentrations are isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the immeasurables are isolated.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the formless absorptions are isolated.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of the unlimited is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of non-dispersal is isolated.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of inherent existence is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of all phenomena is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of its own mark is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of other phenomena is isolated.

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o // ting nge 'dzin rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of non-apprehension is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of non-existence is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the emptiness of essential nature is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the perfection of giving is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the perfection of morality is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the perfection of patience is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the perfection of perseverance is isolated.

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the perfection of concentration is isolated.ğŸ”½The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the perfection of

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the powers of the TathÄgata are isolated.

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the fearlessnesses are isolated.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi @411a *//ğŸ”½pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi @411a *// pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the detailed and thorough knowledges are isolated.

original: snying rje chen po dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the great compassion is isolated.

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //

analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be regarded as isolated because the result of once-returner is isolated.

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
translated: The result of non-returning is to be seen as isolated because of the isolation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //

analyzed: rang byang chub dben pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o //
